mentionedBy.name: Autodesk Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Autodesk's own cloud-based unified design platform integrating CAD, CAM, and CAE. Collaborative environment for simultaneous multi-user work. Powerful parametric modeling, rendering, and simulation features.
